Quotes: Who is rich? He that is content. Who is that? Nobody.
Author: Benjamin Franklin

Quotes: I want you to be everything that's you, deep at the center of your being.
Author: Confucius

Quotes: Chinese people themselves, they really want change.
Author: Dalai Lama

Quotes: I never dreamt, in my dream, I'm Dalai Lama.
Author: Dalai Lama

Quotes: Follow your own star!
Author: Dante Alighieri

Quotes: Imagination was given to man to compensate him for what he is not;a sense of humor to console him for what he is.
Author: Francis Bacon

Quotes: It's so hard to know what to do when one wishes earnestly to do right.
Author: George Bernard Shaw

Quotes: Myths which are believed in tend to become true.
Author: George Orwell

Quotes: Even a mistake may turn out to be the one thing necessary to a worthwhile achievement.
Author: Henry Ford

Quotes: Few people have the imagination for reality.
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quotes: All we are saying is give peace a chance.
Author: John Lennon

Quotes: Optimism is the opium of the people.
Author: Milan Kundera

Quotes: To sit with a dog on a hillside on a glorious afternoon is to be back in Eden, where doing nothing was not boring - it was peace.
Author: Milan Kundera

Quotes: A dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world.
Author: Oscar Wilde

Quotes: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
Author: Oscar Wilde

Quotes: When a person really desires something, all the universe conspires to help that person to realize his dream.
Author: Paulo Coelho

Quotes: How can you prove whether at this moment we are sleeping, and all our thoughts are a dream;or whether we are awake, and talking to one another in the waking state?
Author: Plato

Quotes: We're all dreamers.
Author: Ray Bradbury

Quotes: There is nothing like a dream to create the future.
Author: Victor Hugo

Quotes: If you can dream it, you can do it.
Author: Walt Disney

Quotes: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
Author: William Shakespeare

Quotes: The very substance of the ambitious is merely the shadow of a dream.
Author: William Shakespeare
